item.name: Album APIs

formdata.description: Cover art image (3000x3000 JPG or PNG)
Song 2 featured artists (optional, empty if none)

request.description:
Upload a complete album with multiple songs in one request.

**Requirements:**
- Cover art must be 3000x3000 pixels (JPG or PNG)
- All song arrays must have the same length
- Each song requires: title, artist, producer, track number, and MP3 file
- Featured artists are optional for each song
- The album cover art will be automatically embedded into each MP3 file

**Form Data Structure:**
- `title`: Album title (single value)
- `artist`: Album artist (single value)
- `coverArt`: Cover art image file (single file)
- `songTitles`: Array of song titles (add multiple entries with same key)
- `songArtists`: Array of song artists (add multiple entries with same key)
- `songFeaturedArtists`: Array of featured artists, optional (add multiple entries with same key, can be empty)
- `songProducers`: Array of producers (add multiple entries with same key)
- `songTrackNumbers`: Array of track numbers (add multiple entries with same key)
- `mp3Files`: Array of MP3 files (add multiple files with same key)

**Important:** In Postman, to add multiple values:
1. Click the key field
2. Add the same key multiple times
3. Each entry represents one song
4. The order matters - first songTitles entry matches first songArtists entry, etc.

**Sample Response:**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Album with songs uploaded successfully",
    "album": {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Greatest Hits 2024",
        "artist": "The Weekend",
        "coverArtPath": "./uploads/cover-art/uuid.jpg",
        "totalViews": 0,
        "totalDownloads": 0,
        "createdAt": "2024-01-01T10:00:00",
        "songs": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "title": "Blinding Lights",
                "artist": "The Weekend",
                "featuredArtists": "Ariana Grande",
                "producer": "Max Martin",
                "trackNumber": 1
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "title": "Save Your Tears",
                "artist": "The Weekend",
                "producer": "Oscar Holter",
                "trackNumber": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}
```
Retrieve all albums in the system.
Get album details by ID, including all songs in the album.
Update album title and artist. Replace `1` with the actual album ID.
Delete an album and all its songs. Replace `1` with the actual album ID.

item.name: Song APIs

formdata.description: Cover art image (3000x3000 JPG or PNG)

request.description:
Upload a single track (not part of an album).

**Requirements:**
- Cover art must be 3000x3000 pixels
- MP3 file will have cover art automatically embedded
- Featured artists are optional

**Sample Response:**
```json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Single track uploaded successfully",
    "song": {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Shape of You",
        "artist": "Ed Sheeran",
        "featuredArtists": "Justin Bieber",
        "producer": "Steve Mac",
        "trackNumber": null,
        "coverArtPath": "./uploads/cover-art/uuid.jpg",
        "filePath": "./uploads/songs/uuid.mp3",
        "views": 0,
        "likes": 0,
        "dislikes": 0,
        "downloads": 0,
        "shares": 0,
        "album": null
    }
}
```
Retrieve all songs in the system (both album songs and single tracks).
Get song details by ID, including statistics (views, likes, downloads, etc.).
Get all songs belonging to a specific album. Replace `1` with the album ID.
Update song metadata. Replace `1` with the actual song ID.
Delete a song. Replace `1` with the actual song ID.
Increment the like count for a song.
Increment the dislike count for a song.

Download the MP3 file with embedded cover art. Automatically increments download count.

**Note:** This endpoint returns a binary file (MP3), not JSON.
